titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Stevens in the case of Hunter, et al. v. Kalamarides, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/5/1988--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Stevens in the case of Hunter, et al. v. Kalamarides, et al.
